data.prayer: Father, help the 1,394 believers in Sukkur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sukkur, Sind, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 499,900 people living in Sukkur.
Pour your Spirit out on the 499,900 citizens of Sukkur, Sind, Pakistan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Sukkur, Sind, Pakistan so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Nanbai people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Nanbai people.
Father, it’s possible most of the 493,507 lost people in  Sukkur, Sind, Pakistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Sukkur to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Sukkur, Sind, Pakistan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
